verses.verse: The <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> her <S%H1004>house,<s%> But the <S%H200>foolish<s%> <S%H2040>tears<s%> it <S%H2040>down<s%> with her own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H3372>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> But he who is <S%H3868>crooked<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H959>despises<s%> Him.
In the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish<s%> is a <S%H2415>rod<s%> for [his] <S%H1346>back,<s%> But the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> them.
Where <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H504>oxen<s%> are, the <S%H18>manger<s%> is <S%H1249>clean,<s%> But <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> [comes] by the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox.<s%>
A <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will not <S%H3576>lie,<s%> But a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3577>lies.<s%>
A <S%H9238>scoffer<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and [finds] <S%H369>none,<s%> But <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is <S%H7043>easy<s%> to him who <S%H995>has<s%> <S%H995>understanding.<s%>
<S%H1980>Leave<s%> the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool,<s%> Or you will not <S%H3045>discern<s%> <S%H8193>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
The <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> is to <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> But the <S%H200>folly<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
<S%H191>Fools<s%> <S%H9238>mock<s%> at <S%H817>sin,<s%> But <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> there is <S%H7522>good<s%> <S%H7522>will.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> its <S%H5315>own<s%> <S%H4787>bitterness,<s%> And a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> does not <S%H6148>share<s%> its <S%H8057>joy.<s%>
The <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> But the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H6524>flourish.<s%>
<S%H3426>There<s%> is a <S%H1870>way<s%> [which seems] <S%H3477>right<s%> to a <S%H376>man,<s%> But its <S%H319>end<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H1571>Even<s%> in <S%H7814>laughter<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> may be in <S%H3510>pain,<s%> And the <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H8057>joy<s%> may be <S%H8424>grief.<s%>
The <S%H5472>backslider<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H7646>have<s%> his <S%H7646>fill<s%> of his own ways, But a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will [be satisfied] with his.
The <S%H6612>naive<s%> <S%H539>believes<s%> <S%H3605>everything,<s%> But the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> <S%H6175>man<s%> <S%H995>considers<s%> his <S%H9036>steps.<s%>

A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>man<s%> is <S%H3372>cautious<s%> and <S%H5493>turns<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H9563>evil,<s%> But a <S%H3684>fool<s%> is <S%H9378>arrogant<s%> and <S%H982>careless.<s%>
A quick-tempered man <S%H6213>acts<s%> <S%H200>foolishly,<s%> And a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4209>evil<s%> <S%H4209>devices<s%> is <S%H8130>hated.<s%>
The <S%H6612>naive<s%> <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H200>folly,<s%> But the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> are <S%H3803>crowned<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
The <S%H7451>evil<s%> will <S%H7817>bow<s%> <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2896>good,<s%> And the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> is <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> by his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> But those who <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H6223>rich<s%> are <S%H7227>many.<s%>
He who <S%H936>despises<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2398>sins,<s%> But <S%H835>happy<s%> is he who is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to the <S%H6035>poor.<s%>

Will they not <S%H8582>go<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> who <S%H9177>devise<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%>? But <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> [will be to] those who <S%H9177>devise<s%> <S%H9185>good.<s%>
In <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6089>labor<s%> there is <S%H4195>profit,<s%> But <S%H8193>mere<s%> <S%H1697>talk<s%> [leads] <S%H389>only<s%> to <S%H4270>poverty.<s%>
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is their <S%H6239>riches,<s%> [But] the <S%H200>folly<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is <S%H200>foolishness.<s%>
A <S%H571>truthful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H5337>saves<s%> <S%H5315>lives,<s%> But he who <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> is <S%H4820>treacherous.<s%>
In the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> there is <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4009>confidence,<s%> And his <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> That one may <S%H5493>avoid<s%> the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
In a <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> is a king's <S%H1927>glory,<s%> But in the <S%H657>dearth<s%> of <S%H3816>people<s%> is a prince's <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
He <S%H750>who<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> has <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> But he <S%H7116>who<s%> is quick-tempered <S%H7311>exalts<s%> <S%H200>folly.<s%>
A <S%H4832>tranquil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H9132>life<s%> to the <S%H1320>body,<s%> But <S%H7068>passion<s%> is <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
He who <S%H6231>oppresses<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> But he who is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H3513>honors<s%> Him.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H1760>thrust<s%> <S%H1760>down<s%> by his <S%H9567>wrongdoing,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2620>has<s%> a <S%H2620>refuge<s%> when he <S%H4194>dies.<s%>

<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H5117>rests<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of one who <S%H995>has<s%> <S%H995>understanding,<s%> But in the <S%H7130>bosom<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> it is <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known.<s%>
<S%H6666>Righteousness<s%> <S%H7311>exalts<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> But <S%H9128>sin<s%> is a <S%H9155>disgrace<s%> to [any] <S%H3816>people.<s%>
The king's <S%H7522>favor<s%> is toward a <S%H5650>servant<s%> who <S%H7919>acts<s%> <S%H7919>wisely,<s%> But his <S%H5678>anger<s%> is toward him who <S%H954>acts<s%> <S%H954>shamefully.<s%>
